statements: SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id > 5;
SELECT feedback_date, reviewer_name FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE reviewer_name IN ('John Doe', 'Jane Smith');
SELECT feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT feedback_text, reviewer_name FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE reviewer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, feedback_date, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM employee_feedback GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_feedback > 3
SELECT reviewer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM employee_feedback GROUP BY reviewer_name ORDER BY total_reviews DESC
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, position, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' AND hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 4);
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, position, review_date FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE performance_reviews.rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE employees.department IN ('Engineering', 'Marketing') ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department='Finance' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' AND department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM feedback JOIN employees ON feedback.employee_id = employees.employee_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, review_text, review_date FROM performance_reviews WHERE reviewer_id = (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE full_name = 'Alice');
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, employee_id, feedback_date FROM EmployeeFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT reviewer_id, review_date, review_text FROM PerformanceReview WHERE reviewer_id = 2;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_id, review_date FROM ReviewHistory WHERE review_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Employee.first_name, Employee.last_name, PerformanceReview.review_date, PerformanceReview.review_text FROM Employee INNER JOIN PerformanceReview ON Employee.employee_id = PerformanceReview.employee_id;

SELECT Employee.first_name, Employee.last_name, COUNT(ReviewHistory.review_id) AS total_reviews FROM Employee LEFT JOIN ReviewHistory ON Employee.employee_id = ReviewHistory.employee_id GROUP BY Employee.employee_id ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT department_name, full_name FROM Department JOIN Employee ON Department.manager_id = Employee.employee_id;
SELECT full_name, position, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT review_date, performance_rating FROM PerformanceReview ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT full_name, department, position FROM Employee WHERE department='HR';
SELECT full_name, department, position FROM Employee WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, department, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department='Engineering' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, review_date, performance_rating FROM Feedback JOIN PerformanceReview ON Feedback.review_id = PerformanceReview.review_id WHERE Reviewer.department='IT';
SELECT full_name, department, position FROM Employee WHERE position='Manager' ORDER BY department, full_name;
